sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams, Navigate, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import axios from "axios" const PostPage = () => { const account = useSelector(state => state.account) const post = useLocation().state.post console.log(`data post: `,post) //------------------------------------------------------ if(account.username === null) return return ( <>
{post.by.displayname}
@{post.by.username}
{new Date(post.created_at).toLocaleString()}
{post.content}
{post.likes.length} thích - {post.comments.length} bình luận
{post.tags.map(tag => { return #{tag} })}
{ post.likes.includes(account.username) ? : }
) } export default PostPage
